title: Oceanic Open Ladder
body: Probably already answered elsewhere, but is there going to be another **Oceanic Open Ladder**? and if so when does it start? and how would a team enrol?

replies.body: Would still be nice to have a timeframe of when everything will be setup by.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MpjT0sHh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-27T11:49:16.689+0000)
>
> http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/announcing-2016-opl-season
> 
> Check this announce

Do you know when the tickets go on sale for the Brisbane event?
